title: An Act requiring an annual report on the labor market needs of the Commonwealth

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Finegold, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1333) of Barry R. Finegold for legislation to require an annual report on the labor market needs of the commonwealth.  Labor and Workforce Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development

related_entities.name: committee on Labor and Workforce Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/08/2025 from 10:00 AM-5:00 PM in B-1
Hearing rescheduled to 10/08/2025 from 10:00 AM-12:15 PM in B-1                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on Senate Ways and Means
the committee on Senate Ways and Means
